answers.answer: HiThanks for writing to the forum!This could be a simple boil that is not healing because of either poor blood supply or due to underlying diabetes. It could also be wet herpes. It is difficult to comment without examining. Please consult a skin specialist.Hope this helps. Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!

question: I keep getting pimple on my hand then it break out into a circle of small water bumps which drain.  I been to many doctors who run all types of test and cannot say what the problem is do you have any ideas
title: hands
